text: Logo used when the station used the Los 40 format XHAT-FM is a radio station in Ensenada, Baja California. It broadcasts on 101.1 FM and carries a contemporary hit radio format known as Súper. It was owned by Grupo ACIR until the 2000s. ==References== == External links == * Category:Radio stations in Ensenada, Baja California Category:Radio stations established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in Mexico
title: XHAT-FM
